##[Notes on Maxima]

- real/int: Number simplifications: radsim(9)
- complex: demoivre, exponentialize,
- expressions manipulations: expand, (expand) factor (compact), expandwrt (expand relative to one variable)
  radcan, scsim
- expressions evaluations: numer (evaluate), pred (evaluate predications)
  %i> cos(1), numer;
  %i> 1+2 > 9, pred;
- summations:  simpsum
  %i> simpsum: true$
  %i> sum(a*i,i,1,N)
